price: 56. Haddana waan idin soo nooleynay dhimashadiinnii kaddib, si aad u mahdisaan (Alle, af, uur, iyo addinba).
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
